metadata.title: DEMILI Women's Convertible Deep V Bras Push Up Padded Low Cut Multiway Underwire Plunge Bra with Clear Strap
features: SEXY PLUNGE --- Center deep v plunging neckline design can gather to create a plump breast curve to enhance cleavage and show up your charm.

PUSH UP EFFECT --- The molded padded cup with underwire helps to give you a extra lifting which at least makes you add one cup up for more attractive. Especially fit for the petite women who want to add a size up, offering you a boosting and lifting breast shape.

CLEAR STRAP STYLE --- Detachable bra straps with long adjustable length and easily removable in order to replace with a invisible straps. Our convertible bra offer multiple wearing methods: traditional, crisscross and halter.

MULTIWAY OCCASION --- Our convertible push up bra have plunging top without embarrassment of leaking your bra, make you feel free to wear halter dress, deep V plunge dress, low-cut top or dresses for the occasion like prom, wedding, party, cosplay, banquet, ceremony, and to hang out.

INCREDIBLE COMFORT --- Our plunge v bra is pretty supple to make you wearing comfort all day. The smooth outer fabric gives you a smooth, seamless appearance. The soft foam padding and bottom underwire give extra supportive. The straps are widen to keep from digging into your shoulders, reduce stress.
description: 85% polyamide 15% Spandex 90% Polyester 10% Spandexbra Size: from 32A to 42CColor Choice: Black, Nude, WhiteAdjustable, convertible straps for wardrobeHook and Eye closureYou can enjoy light support and maximum comfortHand wash and hang dry suggested for longer durabilitybralettes for women with supportIt is a must-have product for attending formal occasions and evening partiesQuality guarantee: 100% Brand New , We strictly control each production steps to guarantee that the product is delivered to you without any defect for your satisfaction is our driving forceServices: Please feel free to contact us anytime no matter it is in pre-sales or after-sales stage, and we are pleased to answer each of your questions
